author: rleland
msg: Fix web/blank struts-config.xml the DTD reference was mismatched.
Update DTD references and test both struts 1.1 & 1.2 DTD in unit tests.
Also remove unused validator DTD and tiles DTD from June 2002,
the remaining tiles DTD was from Nov 2002.

author: husted
msg: Update to use forward attribute rather than ForwardAction.

author: germuska
msg: 1) Throw JspException when no form is found in the ValidatorResources under
2) Run validator messages through a routine to escape quote marks so that
the emitted JavaScript is syntactically correct.

author: germuska
msg: remove comments explaining commons-validator dep. because it can now be downloaded from the IBiblio repository

author: germuska
msg: implement support for file uploads in o.a.s.c.servlet.PopulateActionForm; note that o.a.s.c.AbstractPopulateActionForm does not support file uploads directly.
